name: @jet-lab/jet-bonds-client
description: Library for interacting with the Jet Bonds on-chain programs

scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build --target nodejs ./wasm-utils ; copyfiles -u 1 wasm-utils/pkg/* dist/wasm-utils
scripts.watch:wasm: cargo watch -w 'libraries/ts/bonds/wasm-utils/src'  -w 'libraries/ts/bonds/wasm-utils/Cargo.toml' -s 'wasm-pack build --target nodejs libraries/ts/bonds/wasm-utils' -s 'copyfiles -u 4 libraries/ts/bonds/wasm-utils/pkg/* libraries/ts/bonds/dist/wasm-utils'
